page.title: 07Education--Denny & dunipace
page.content: {Denny High School}is the only Secondary School. It has about 1400 pupils but not all come from Denny and Dunipace. Roman Catholic secondary pupils attend{St.Modan's High School in Stirling. There are 5{Primary {Schools}with about l630 pupils. The newest is our school, St.Patrick's. This R.C. school was opened in l982, is semi- open plan in style and is committed to the{team-teaching}system for 8 to l2 year old pupils. Younger pupils from P.1 to P.3 are not involved in this method. Subjects include English, Computation, Maths, Environmental Studies, Religious Knowledge, Art, Needlework, Craft, P.E., Music, Drama, Swimming and Dancing.{Nursery}and{Adult Education {are catered for. There}are about 50 {Asian}children in Denny schools.
